title: Support Orbital Temple - Lowani nawo Mishoni
heading: Thandizani Orbital Temple
vision: Pa Novembara 28, 2025 , Orbital Temple idzakhazikitsidwa kuchokera ku India pa roketi ya ISRO . Satellite yochita nawo mbali yochokera ku Global South, ndichikumbutso cha kuphatikizika kwakukulu, nsanja yamaphunziro, komanso chothandizira kukambirana padziko lonse lapansi za tsogolo la opatulika mu nthawi yaukadaulo, AI komanso kufufuza malo.
videoCaption: Kuyambitsa vidiyo ya Orbital Temple, 1 min.

accomplished.heading: Zimene Tachita
accomplished.content: Pambuyo pa zaka zinayi za kafukufuku ndi chitukuko, ntchitoyo ndi yokonzeka. Tamaliza kukonza ma hardware ndi mapulogalamu a satellite, tapambana mayeso ovomerezeka a shaker ofunikira kuti tipeze satifiketi ya ndege, ndikumaliza mgwirizano wathu ndi ISRO. Satellite idapangidwa. Ukadaulo umagwira ntchito. Ife tayeretsedwa kuti tiyambe.

needs.heading: Zomwe Timafunikira Thandizo
needs.intro: Kuti titsirize ntchito yodziwika bwinoyi ndikukulitsa mphamvu zake, tifunika thandizo pazigawo zisanu zofunika:

decade.heading: Zaka khumi Patsogolo
decade.intro: Ntchitoyi sikutha pa Novembara 28, 2025. Yangoyamba kumene.
decade.paragraph1: Kwa zaka 10 zikubwerazi, satelayiti iyi idzazungulira Dziko Lapansi, kuyankha mayina otumizidwa kuchokera kumakona onse a dziko lapansi. Pulogalamu yamaphunziroyi ikufuna kuphunzitsa achinyamata masauzande ambiri paukadaulo wa satellite, kuswa Space Gap for the Global South. Zopelekedwa zidzafika mamiliyoni padziko lonse lapansi, ndikuyambitsa zokambirana zakukhala, kukumbukira, ndi zopatulika.
decade.paragraph2: Orbital Temple ikugwirizana ndi Sathi Roy ndi The Roy Foundation kuti masomphenya azaka khumiwa akhale ofunika kwambiri pachikhalidwe. Roy Foundation ndi bungwe lopanda phindu lodzipereka kukulitsa mwayi wopeza maphunziro auzimu, machiritso amalingaliro, ndi zida za kuzindikira kwa anthu omwe alibe chitetezo padziko lonse lapansi, kulumikiza nzeru zakale ndiukadaulo wamakono kuti apange dziko lozindikira, lolumikizana, komanso lachifundo. Pamodzi, tikumanga maziko owonetsetsa kuti Orbital Temple ikhale gulu lokhazikika lomwe limafikira anthu padziko lonse lapansi.
decade.paragraph3: Thandizo lanu silimangopereka ndalama zothandizira kukhazikitsa; zimapanga kayendetsedwe kamene kadzamveka kwa zaka khumi ndikulimbikitsa mbadwo wotsatira wa akatswiri ojambula ndi mainjiniya.

individualDonations.heading: Zopereka Payekha
individualDonations.intro: Lowani nawo mishoni pamlingo womwe umakuthandizani. Othandizira payekha ndiye maziko a polojekitiyi.

satelliteSupporter.benefits: Mwalandira: Zopindulitsa zonse za Bwenzi la Orbital · Kufikira pa pulogalamu ya satellite yotsatirira mwapadera · Wojambula zikomo uthenga wa kanema · Lisiti yochotsera msonkho

fundingOpportunities.heading: Limbikitsani Ndalama Zachindunji
fundingOpportunities.intro: Zopereka zanu zimapereka mwachindunji mbali zina za ntchitoyo. Sankhani zomwe zimalankhula nanu, kapena phatikizani zingapo kuti mupange zambiri.

launch.title: Limbikitsani ndalama pa Space Launch
launch.description: Kukhazikitsa kwenikweni kunawononga roketi ya ISRO pa Novembara 28, 2025 . Izi zimatumiza Orbital Temple mu orbit, komwe ikhalabe kwa zaka khumi ngati satellite yaukadaulo yolumikizirana komanso kachisi wakumwamba, wofikiridwa ndi aliyense padziko lapansi.
launch.benefits: Mulandila: Mutu wa "Launch Sponsor" · Zowonetsedwa m'mawu onse atolankhani · Chivomerezo chojambulidwa pa skrini · mwayi wa VIP woyambitsa zochitika · Lowani nawo makanema apamtundu wa quarterly ndi Edson ndi gulu la mishoni · Chiphaso chokhala ndi data ya satellite orbital · Lisiti yochotsa msonkho

travel.title: Ndalama za Ulendo wa Artist kupita ku India
travel.description: Ndalama zoyendera, zogona, ndi zopangira za wojambula Edson Pavoni ndi gulu lalikulu kuti akachitire umboni kukhazikitsidwa ku India pa Novembara 28, 2025 . Ulendowu ndi wofunikira pojambula zojambula, kufalitsa nkhani, komanso kuimira Global South pa nthawi ya mbiri yakale.
travel.benefits: Mumalandira: Zikomo inu mwini kuchokera kwa wojambula · Kupeza zolemba zakale

carbon.title: Thandizani Pulogalamu ya Carbon Offset
carbon.description: Kutulutsa konse kwa kaboni sikudzakhala kocheperako, kuphatikiza kuwulutsa kwa rocket ndi kupanga satellite. Tikugwira ntchito ndi mapulogalamu otsimikizika a carbon offset kuti tiwonetsetse kuti ntchitoyi isakhale ndi zotsatira zoyipa zachilengedwe.
carbon.benefits: Mumalandira: Dzina mumndandanda waulemu watsamba lawebusayiti · Satifiketi yaumwini · Lisiti yochotsa msonkho

education.title: Limbikitsani Pulogalamu Yophunzitsa
education.description: Konzani ndi kuyambitsa maphunziro a zinenero zambiri ophunzitsa achinyamata aku Global South momwe angapangire masatilaiti. Zimaphatikizapo chitukuko cha maphunziro, kupanga makanema, kuchititsa pulatifomu, ndi chaka choyamba cha maphunziro a ophunzira omwe sali ophunzitsidwa bwino. Amapanga maziko okhalitsa ophunzirira zakuthambo.
education.benefits: Mumalandira: "Kuzindikiridwa Kwa Woyambitsa Maphunziro" · Maphunziro a maphunziro m'dzina lanu · Zowonetsedwa m'mabuku ophunzirira · Kumanani ndi gulu loyamba la ophunzira omwe amalipidwa ndi maphunziro anu (mwamunthu kapena mwamunthu) · Gawo lazolemba zolembedwa · Mwayi wolankhula pamwambo wotsegulira · Lisiti yochotsera msonkho

docPreProd.title: Thandizani Documentary Pre-Production
docPreProd.description: Limbikitsani gawo loyamba la "Kodi Kachisi Amapanga Chiyani?" zolemba. Kumaphatikizapo kuchita zoyankhulana zakuya za 2 ku India ndi atsogoleri oganiza bwino ndi ochita zauzimu, maulendo ang'onoang'ono oyenda ndi kupanga, ndikusintha zithunzi zomwe zisanachitike. Gawoli limakhazikitsa maziko a zolemba ndikutsimikizira njira yopangira.
docPreProd.benefits: Mukulandila: Ngongole Yothandizira Wopanga · Dzina muzolemba zamakalata · Kuyang'anira kwachinsinsi kwa kanema asanapangidwe · Kufikira kumbuyo kwazithunzi · Lisiti yochotsa msonkho

docProd.title: Ndalama Zopanga Zolemba
docProd.description: Kupanga ndi kutulutsa pambuyo "Kodi Chimapanga Kachisi N'chiyani?" , zokambidwa zomwe zikuwonetsa mphambano zamaluso, ukadaulo, ndi zopatulika. Kuphatikizapo kujambula m'maiko angapo, kuyankhulana kwina ndi atsogoleri oganiza bwino, kusintha kokwanira, kuyika mitundu, kapangidwe ka mawu, ndi zowonera koyamba ku India ndi NYC .
docProd.benefits: Mukulandira: Ngongole ya Executive Producer · Opezeka m'maudindo otsegulira

artCollector.title: Khalani Wotoleretsa Wokha wa Orbital Temple
artCollector.imageAlt: Kukhazikitsidwa kwa kachisi wa Orbital ku Mercosul Biennial
artCollector.imageCaption: Kachisi wa Orbital ku 13th Mercosul Biennial, Porto Alegre. Chithunzi chojambulidwa ndi Clara Marques.
artCollector.paragraph1: Ma satellite atatu ofanana adapangidwira ntchitoyi. Imodzi idzayamba mlengalenga pa November 28, 2025. Mmodzi amapita kumalo owonetsera zakale padziko lonse lapansi. Imodzi imasungidwa kwa wokhometsa wowolowa manja yemwe akufuna kulipira ndalama za masomphenyawa ndikukhala ndi mbiri yakale ya mlengalenga.
artCollector.paragraph2: Izi si zofananira; ndi imodzi mwama satellite atatu oyambilira. Chombo chogwira ntchito mokwanira chomwe chilinso chosema . Setilaitiyo ndi 5cm³ ndipo imalemera 245g , yokhala ndi dome lopangidwa ndi golide .
artCollector.paragraph4: Monga osonkhanitsa, mudzalandira kuyika komweko komwe kunapangidwira 13th Mercosul Biennial , chiwonetsero chathunthu cha museological chomwe chimasonyeza satellite monga luso ndi luso lamakono. Kuyika uku kwawonetsedwa m'malo akuluakulu apadziko lonse lapansi ndipo ndikuyimira mawonekedwe apamwamba kwambiri owonetsera zamlengalenga.
artCollector.paragraph5: Thandizo lanu limathandizira masomphenya onse: kukhazikitsidwa, pulogalamu yamaphunziro, ndi zolemba zomwe zidzayambitse zokambirana zapadziko lonse za zopatulika muzaka zaukadaulo, AI ndi kufufuza malo. Dzina lanu limakhala lolumikizana ndi mbiri yakale.

gratitude.heading: Ndi Kuyamikira Othandizira Athu
gratitude.intro: Orbital Temple imatheka chifukwa cha mabungwe, anthu, ndi okhulupilira omwe amamvetsetsa kuti luso limapanga malingaliro a mawa.

pearmill.title: Woyambitsa Wothandizira
pearmill.description: Pearmill ndi amodzi mwa mabungwe omwe akukula mwachangu kwambiri ku US, gulu la opanga, otsatsa, ndi mainjiniya omwe akugwira ntchito limodzi kuti athandizire kukulitsa zina mwazinthu zodziwika bwino kwambiri padziko lonse lapansi. Thandizo lawo mowolowa manja linathandiza gulu la Orbital Temple kugula zinthu zofunika kwambiri ndikupanga zida zotseguka zomwe zimapangitsa kuti ntchito ya satellite iyi itheke.

gratitude.yourName: Dzina lanu likhoza kukhala pano. Lowani nafe popanga mbiri.

people.heading: Anthu Amene Ali Mmbuyo Ntchitoyi
people.intro: Orbital Temple ndi kudzipereka kwa zaka 10. Imatsogozedwa ndi anthu awiri omwe adakhala moyo wawo wonse kulumikiza zaluso, ukadaulo, ndi kulumikizana kwa anthu, ndipo omwe akupanga zomangamanga kuti apitilize masomphenyawa kwazaka khumi zikubwerazi.

edson.name: Edson Pavoni
edson.paragraph1: Edson ndi wojambula komanso waukadaulo yemwe amafufuza ubale wa anthu pamzere waukadaulo ndiukadaulo. Zochita zake zimagwirizana ndi zomangamanga, ndakatulo, kujambula, ndi luso la satellite.
edson.paragraph2: Ntchito yake yawonetsedwa pa 13th Mercosul Biennial (Brazil), IX International Biennale (Uzbekistan), ndi NTU Global Digital Art Prize (Singapore).
edson.paragraph3: Kwa zaka zoposa 20 pazaluso ndi luso lamakono , wakhala akugwira ntchito ndi magulu opanga masewera a Olimpiki a Rio a 2016 ndi Inter American Development Bank . Wotchulidwa m'modzi mwa akatswiri 50 otsogola kwambiri ku Brazil ndi Proxxima Magazine, adalandira Mphotho ziwiri zotsatizana za IF Design (2017-2018) ndipo anali womaliza Mphotho ya Lumen Prize Futures . Ntchito yake yakhala ikuwonetsedwa muzaka ziwiri ziwiri ndipo idaperekedwa ku Ludwig Museum of Contemporary Art (Budapest), Inhotim Institute (Brazil), ndi Design and Fashion Museum (Lisbon), ndi ziwonetsero ku New York, Beijing, Singapore, Dubai, Rio de Janeiro, ndi mizinda ina.

sathi.name: Sathi Roy
sathi.role: Woyambitsa, The Roy Foundation & Strategic Partner
sathi.paragraph1: Sathi ndiye amene anayambitsa The Roy Foundation , bungwe lopanda phindu lodzipereka kukulitsa mwayi wopeza maphunziro auzimu, machiritso a maganizo, ndi zida za chidziwitso kwa madera osatetezedwa padziko lonse lapansi. Maziko amagwirizana ndi masukulu, mabungwe azikhalidwe, ndi mabungwe am'deralo kuti agawane zida za Umoyo zoyendetsedwa ndi AI, maphunziro ammudzi, ndi media zomwe zimalimbikitsa kusintha.
sathi.paragraph2: Pokhala ndi mbiri ya sayansi ya ubongo, kuphunzitsa, ndi utsogoleri, Sathi wamanga ndi kutsogolera magulu ku North America ndi India, kupanga $ 600 miliyoni pakugulitsa pachaka pa ntchito imodzi. Iye ndiyenso woyambitsa OHM , gulu lauzimu loyamba la digito, Co-Founder wa SUTE (pulatifomu yaofesi ya digito ya AI), ndipo amatumikira monga Mlangizi ndi Global Head of Growth kwa RISE Global Creative .
sathi.paragraph3: Monga mzimayi wa Chibengali-America yemwe amagwirizanitsa nzeru za Kum'mawa ndi Kumadzulo, Sathi amabweretsa malingaliro apadera a kayendedwe kauzimu ndi luso m'zaka za zana la 21. Ndi maukonde omwe akuchulukirachulukira a otsatira 65,000+ komanso opitilira 40 miliyoni pa intaneti , akumanga madera apadziko lonse lapansi omwe amalumikizana pazikhalidwe ndi zauzimu.

people.together: Pamodzi ndi The Roy Foundation, tikumanga ntchito yazaka 10 yomwe imagwirizanitsa zaluso, ukadaulo, maphunziro, ndi zopatulika, kuyambira ndikukhazikitsa satellite pa Novembara 28, 2025, ndikupitiliza ndi gulu lomwe lidzafikira anthu omwe alibe chitetezo padziko lonse lapansi ndikulimbikitsa m'badwo wotsatira.

join.heading: Titsatireni
join.content: Satellite idapangidwa. Ukadaulo ndi wokonzeka. Tsiku lotsegulira lakhazikitsidwa: Novembara 28, 2025 . Ino ndi nthawi yoti mulowe nawo ntchito yomwe imaganiziranso zomwe luso lingachite, komwe lingapite, ndi omwe lingatumikire.

fundSpecific.heading: Limbikitsani Ndalama Zachindunji Kapena Khalani Wothandizira Woyambitsa
fundSpecific.description: Sankhani imodzi mwa mwayi wopeza ndalama pamwambapa, funsani za kukhala wotolera zaluso, kapena kambiranani za chithandizo chomwe chikugwirizana ndi masomphenya anu.

generalDonation.heading: Pangani Chopereka Chochotsa Misonkho
generalDonation.description: Zopereka zonse, zazikulu kapena zazing'ono, zimathandizira ntchitoyo ndipo zimachotsedwa misonkho kudzera mwa wothandizira ndalama, The Field.

taxInfo.heading: Kupereka kwa Misonkho
taxInfo.paragraph1: Orbital Temple ndi ntchito yothandizidwa ndi ndalama ya The Field (Performance Zone Inc.) , bungwe la 501(c)(3) lopanda phindu lokhala ku New York. Zopereka zonse zaku US zimachotsedwa msonkho malinga ndi zomwe malamulo amaloledwa.
